thread.title: Monex Snaps Up Coincheck as Firms Compete in Cryptocurrency Land Grab

author: wsjcom
title: Monex Snaps Up Coincheck as Firms Compete in Cryptocurrency Land Grab
text:
TOKYO—Internet brokerage Monex Group Inc. said Friday it would buy beleaguered bitcoin exchange Coincheck Inc. for about $34 million, becoming the latest established Japanese internet firm to jump into cryptocurrencies.
Monex said it aimed to fully restore operations at the startup in two months. Coincheck suffered a hack in January and lost customer assets then valued at ¥58 billion ($540 million).
